name: brainwashing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of making someone believe something by repeatedly telling them that it is true and preventing any other information from reaching them: Many people thought the sect was guilty of brainwashing. This is corporate brainwashing on a massive scale.
More examplesFewer examplesThis relentless media hysteria is actually a form of brainwashing. Such systematic brainwashing is bound to have bad effects.We have to undo the brainwashing of the past 50 years about what a movie can be.
